text:
routes get ignored when using cookies, instead a message "All workers are in
error state for route X" gets logged, because the cookie values are left with
double quotes

creator: peter@sabaini.at
text:
Created attachment 18605
strip double quotes from cookie

text: oops that is in fact not an apache problem, sorry for the confusion.
